original_title: Earthgeist The Movie - A World Divided
overview: Filmmaker Tim Crawford looks at a World Divided and the defining spirit of the ideas and events now affecting our world. Global Warming, Deforestation, Biodiversity, Population, Plastic Pollution, the Oceans, Melting of the Polar Caps, Farming, Energy, Drinking Water and Irrigation, Child Activists, all these topics and more are now part of the Global consciousness. This is Earthgeist.
title: Earthgeist The Movie - A World Divided
